properties.name: MW-1
properties.description: Upgradient Cherry Creek Alluvial well adjacent to Pinery production well No. 6

properties.name: MW-2
properties.description: Sample collected from Pinery monitor well E-2 downgradient of the Pinery's Rapid Infiltration Basins

properties.name: MW-3
properties.description: Sample collected from parker KOA-1 production well loc ated downgradient of land application area used by Parker.  Pumping of the PWSD KOA-1 & 2 wells was discontinued in the fall of 2010 due to water quality issues.  JCHA scheduled replacement in 2012.

properties.name: MW-3b
properties.description: Sample collected from parker NPDES monitor well No. 3.  Well was abandoned in December 2001 as a result of development.  Sampled alluvial groundwater below Parker AWT discharge

properties.name: MW-5
properties.description:
Alluvial monitor well located adjacent to Arapahoe's Loud#2 production well.  Samples groundwater below Rueter Hess Reservoir.
AKA KOA Radio Tower Site.

properties.name: MW-6
properties.description: Alluvial monitor well located downgradient of PWSD North AWT plant.  Well is adjacent to Arapahoe's Race #1 production well.

properties.name: MW-9
properties.description: Alluvial monitor well located in Cherry Creek State Park near Nature Center to define water quality of alluvial groundwater entering Cherry Creek Reservoir.

properties.name: Kennedy Groundwater
properties.description: Well located on Kennedy Golf Course to monitor groundwater quality downgradient from Cherry Creek Reservoir

properties.name: CC-1 Surface Flow
properties.description:
River Station 1798+30

Surface water quality collection site located below confluence of McMurdo Gulch and Bayou Gulch and above the Pinery's AWT plant

properties.name: CC-2 Surface Flow
properties.description:
River Station 1602+00

Surface water quality collection site located below the Pinery's AWT Plant

properties.name: CC-4 Surface Flow
properties.description:
RiverStation 1303+00

Surface water quality collection site located below confluence with Sulphur Gulch and below outfall for Parker's AWT plant.

properties.name: CC-5 Surface Flow
properties.description:
RiverStation 1213+50

Surface water quality collection site located immediately downgradient of the confluence with Newlin Gulch in anticipation of construction and operation of Ruetter Hess Reservoir

properties.name: CC-6 Surface Flow
properties.description:
River Station 1091+30

Surface water quality site located downgradient of Parker's North AWT plant, but discharge of North plant piped to Sulphur Gulch

properties.name: CC-7 Surface Flow - New
properties.description:
RiverStation 966+30

Surface flow only observation station.

properties.name: CC-8 Surface Flow
properties.description:
RiverStation 879+90

Surface water collection site located downgradient of the Valley Country Club and an area with known ISDS's

properties.name: CC-9 Surface Flow
properties.description:
River Station 745+50

Surface water quality collection site located just upgradient of Cherry Creek Reservoir
